services.brief_description: Update Proof of Identity (PoI) or Proof of Address (PoA) documents in your Aadhaar record.
required_documents_brief: Original copies of supporting documents required for physical center visits
services.official_fee_note: Online Document Update via myAadhaar Portal: FREE. Demographic Update (at center only): ₹75. Biometric Update (at center only): ₹100.
services.otp_required_note: MANDATORY. Aadhaar-linked mobile number for OTP authentication (e-KYC) required for all online updates and center appointment booking.
services.estimated_self_service_man_hours: 2–8 Hours (Time spent on document collection, form filling, and appointment booking/e-KYC filing).

services.service_name: Permanent Account Number (PAN) Card: New Application
services.brief_description: Application for a new PAN (Instant e-PAN or Physical Card). Mandatory for financial transactions and tax filing.
required_documents_brief: Proof of Identity, Address, and Date of Birth documents for physical card (e.g., Passport, Driving License, EPIC)
services.official_fee_note: Instant e-PAN (via Income Tax Portal): FREE. Physical Card (Within India): Approx. ₹107. e-PAN only (via NSDL/Protean): Approx. ₹66.
services.otp_required_note: MANDATORY. Aadhaar-linked mobile number for OTP authentication required for Instant e-PAN and digital submission of Form 49A/49AA.
services.estimated_self_service_man_hours: 1–3 Hours (Low effort due to high digitization and e-KYC process).

services.brief_description: Online application preparation for Fresh Passport or Re-issue under the Normal scheme.
required_documents_brief: Proof of Present Address (e.g., Utility Bill, Bank Statement, Rent Agreement)
Proof of Date of Birth (e.g., Birth Certificate, Aadhaar)
services.official_fee_note: Normal Adult (36 pages/10 years): ₹1,500. Minor (36 pages/5 years): ₹1,000. Fees must be paid online via the official portal gateway to book the appointment.
services.otp_required_note: OTP required for user registration and login to the Passport Seva Portal. E-Sign/e-KYC optional for faster verification; physical documents are mandatory at the PSK appointment.
services.estimated_self_service_man_hours: 3–5 Hours (Time spent on complex form filling, document compilation, and securing the appointment slot).

services.brief_description: Application for a Learner's License (first step to obtaining a full Driving License).
services.official_fee_note: Varies by class of vehicle (e.g., ₹500, ₹950, or ₹1400). Retest Fee: ₹50.
services.otp_required_note: MANDATORY for application submission and subsequent appointment booking/re-appointment through the Sarathi portal.
services.estimated_self_service_man_hours: 2–4 Hours (Time spent on obtaining medical certificates, form filling, and online slot booking for the test).

services.service_name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS) Application
services.brief_description: Application for the national social security pension scheme (State and Central contributions) for citizens aged 60+ and below the poverty line (BPL).
required_documents_brief: Age Proof (e.g., Birth Certificate, Medical Board Certificate)
Affidavit attested by Judicial/Executive Magistrate (declaring no other pension received)
services.official_fee_note: FREE application process. The scheme provides a central contribution of ₹200–₹500 monthly, plus state supplements.
services.otp_required_note: Likely required for application through online portals (e.g., UMANG/State SSP portal) for secure login and Aadhaar verification.
services.estimated_self_service_man_hours: 5–10 Hours (Higher effort due to complex document requirements, including affidavit procurement and attestation, and physical submission requirements in some regions).
